amendment.description: To address funding for high-threat nonprofit organizations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4550 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4550 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S7494-7496) To address funding for high-threat nonprofit organizations.
